snippet.title: Happy Poker - Trailer
snippet.description:
🃏Doudizhu+⚔️Three Kindoms Kill+🤡Balatro=?......Happy Poker!

With 14 unique charaters, 108 spell cards and 150 relics, Happy Poker is officially launched! 🎉🎉

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2474750/Happy_Card/

Build your own exclusive deck, modify your cards or upgrade card types using rule cards, and combine them with a discard-based strategy to unleash explosive stacking damage! The game also features dozens of spell cards and relics for you to customize, creating a fun and strategic deck!

Let’s dive into an exciting card game! 🥳🥳
